Package view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
    The view class for the entire game.

      • drawWorldOnline

        public void drawWorldOnline​(Map map)
        Draws the online world from the server and features for the online game. A chat for instance should be added here. (drawWorld() should have been executed already)
        Parameters:
        map - The map to be drawn

      • updateInGameServerWindow

        public void updateInGameServerWindow​(java.lang.String message)
        Updates the server chat window in the game scene. The server chat window is NOT meant to display chat messages. (There is a separate chat window for chat messages)

      • updateInGameClientChatWindow

        public void updateInGameClientChatWindow​(java.lang.String message)
        Updates the client chat window in the game scene. The server chat window is NOT meant to display any server messages. (There is a separate window for server messagess)

      • displayAcceptButton

        public void displayAcceptButton​(java.lang.Object o,
                                boolean freeCost)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Displays an "Accept" button.
        Parameters:
        o - Must be a street or a waypoint.
        freeCost - Can we build for free?
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Fail, if not street and not waypoint.

      • drawOptionsForYearOfPleanty

        public void drawOptionsForYearOfPleanty​(ResourceType firstResource)
        Creates a menu to for the player to chose which resourcetype to request. The first input for firstResource is null, and then when we've chosen the first resource this method will be called again, creating a menu again, but now with the resource we chose before as firstResource
        Parameters:
        firstResource -
